columns.description: The organ donor's UNOS ID.

columns.description: The organ donor's date of death.

columns.description: The organ donor's age at death.

columns.description: The organ donor's height in inches.

columns.name: WEIGHT_OZ

columns.description:
The organ donor's ethnic group.

columns.name: HAD_HYPERTENSION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies whether the organ donor had hypertension.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown

columns.name: HYPERTENSION_YEARS
columns.description: Specifies the number of years the organ donor had hypertension.

columns.name: HAD_DIABETES_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies whether the organ donor had diabetes.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAD_HYPERTENSION_C_NAME

columns.name: DIABETES_YEARS
columns.description: Specifies the number of years the organ donor had diabetes.

columns.name: HAD_CANCER_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies whether the organ donor had cancer.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAD_HYPERTENSION_C_NAME

columns.name: TOBACCO_USE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the organ donor's use of tobacco.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Current/Former


Passive


Never

columns.name: TOBACCO_QUIT_DATE
columns.description: Specifies the date the organ donor quit using tobacco.

columns.name: TOBACCO_PACKS_PER_DAY
columns.description: Specifies the organ donor's tobacco use in packs per day.

columns.name: TOBACCO_YEARS
columns.description: Specifies the number of years the organ donor used tobacco.

columns.name: TOBACCO_COMMENT
columns.description: Specifies comments about organ donor's use of tobacco.

columns.name: ALCOHOL_USE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the organ donor's use of alcohol.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Not Asked


Defer

Never

columns.name: ALCOHOL_OZ_PER_WEEK
columns.description: Specifies the organ donor's alcohol consumption in ounces per week.

columns.name: ALCOHOL_COMMENT
columns.description: Specifies comments about organ donor's use of alcohol.

columns.name: DRUG_USE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies organ donor's illicit use of drugs.

columns.name: DRUG_COMMENTS
columns.description: Specifies comments about organ donor's illicit use of drugs.

columns.name: DEATH_CAUSE_C_NAME

Specifies the cause of death of organ donor.

 Category Entries:

CNS Tumor

columns.name: DEATH_CAUSE_OTHER
columns.description: Specifies cause of death of organ donor (free text).

columns.name: RISK_PERCENTAGE
columns.description: The kidney donor's risk profile percentage.

columns.description:
Specifies organ donor type.

 Category Entries: 


Living

Auto

columns.name: DONOR_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies organ donor class.

 Category Entries: 


Standard Criteria Donor


Expanded Criteria Donor

columns.name: CDC_HIGH_RISK_YN
columns.description:
Specifies whether the donor has risk factors for blood-borne disease transmission.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OPO_HIGH_RISK_YN
columns.description:
Specifies whether the donor is qualified as a OPO high risk donor.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CDC_HIGH_RISK_YN

columns.name: HOSPITAL_DAYS
columns.description: Specifies the number of days the donor was admitted before death.

columns.name: ICU_DAYS
columns.description: Specifies the number of days the donor was in ICU before death.

columns.name: GIVEN_CPR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies whether CPR was performed on the donor before death.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAD_HYPERTENSION_C_NAME

columns.name: CPR_DUR_MINUTES
columns.description: Specifies the number of minutes CPR was performed on the donor before death.

columns.name: DOB_ESTIMATED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies whether the donor's date of birth was estimated.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAD_HYPERTENSION_C_NAME

columns.name: GIVEN_PRESSOR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies whether pressors were given to the donor.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAD_HYPERTENSION_C_NAME

columns.name: GIVEN_PITRESSIN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies whether the donor was given Pitressin.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAD_HYPERTENSION_C_NAME

columns.name: LOWEST_SYSTOLIC_BP
columns.description: Specifies the donor's lowest systolic value of blood pressure.

columns.name: LOWEST_DIASTOLIC_BP
columns.description: Specifies the donor's lowest diastolic value of blood pressure.

columns.name: BP_LOW_DURATION
columns.description: Specifies the length in time the donor experienced the lowest recorded blood pressure.

columns.name: URINE_MEASURED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies whether the donor's urine output was measured.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HAD_HYPERTENSION_C_NAME

columns.name: URINE_AVERAGE_VOLUME
columns.description: Specifies the donor's average urine output volume in mL.

columns.name: URINE_LAST_HOUR_VOLUME
columns.description: Specifies the donor's urine output volume in mL for the last hour before death.

columns.name: URINE_TOTAL_VOLUME
columns.description: Specifies the donor's total urine output volume in mL.
